All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddAnnouncementFragment
 
AddEventActivity
 
AddEventCommand
Concrete command class that implements the Command interface.
AddEventTests
 
AddFailureListener
Interface for handling failure events during addition operations.
AddSuccessListener<T>
Interface for handling successful addition operations.
Admin
Represents an administrator of the system.
AdminController
Controller responsible for managing interactions with the Firestore Database for admin-related operations.
AdminControllerIntegrationTest
This class contains integration tests for AdminController class.
AdminDeleteEventTest
Test class for deletion of events by an administrator.
AdminDeleteProfileTest
Test class for deletion of profiles by an administrator.
AdministratorBrowseImages
This class will be the activity where admin can browse images (posters, profile pic).
AdministratorBrowseProfiles
This class will be the page to browse profiles for admin.
AdministratorHome
This class will be the home page for organizer.
AdministratorViewEventFragment
This class is the fragment for the individual event view for Administrator
AdminProfileRecyclerViewAdapter
This class is the adapter for the RecyclerView of user profiles.
AdminProfileRecyclerViewAdapter.OnItemClickListener
This method is the interface for the item click listener.
Announcement
Represents an announcement related to a specific event.
AnnouncementActivity
Announcement activity displays announcements related to events.
AnnouncementRecyclerViewAdapter
 
AnnouncementRecyclerViewAdapter.OnItemClickListener
Interface for clickListener
AnnouncementTest
 
AttendeeRecyclerViewAdapter
RecyclerView Adapter for displaying attendees in different modes (SIGN_UP_MODE or CHECK_IN_MODE).
CameraActivity
CameraActivity allows users to scan QR codes and perform check-ins to events.
CaptureAct
This class extends the CaptureActivity provided by JourneyApps for QR code scanning functionality.
Command
The Command interface represents a generic command that can be executed.
Date
This class ia a representation of the date in a usable format to be displayed
DateTest
 
DeleteFailureListener
Listener interface for handling the failure of delete operations.
DeleteSuccessListener
Listener interface for handling the success of delete operations.
DeviceID
This class represents the device ID entity.
EditProfileActivity
Activity for users to edit pfp and name
Event
The Event class represents an event entity with various attributes such as ID, name, date, description, etc.
EventController
Controller responsible for managing interactions with events in the Firestore Database.
EventControllerIntegrationTest
 
EventRecyclerViewAdapter
Adapter for the event recycler view
EventRecyclerViewAdapter.OnItemClickListener
Method is the interface for the item click listener
EventTest
 
ExampleInstrumentedTest
Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
ExampleUnitTest
Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
FirestoreDB
The FirestoreDB class provides access to Firebase database instances and collection references through static methods.
GetFailureListener
Listener interface for handling the failure of retrieving objects from the database.
GetSuccessListener<T>
Listener interface for handling the success of retrieving objects from the database.
GraphAnalyticsActivity
This class displays the event analytics for the organizer's events through bar chart.
ImageAdapter
This class is an adapter for displaying images in a grid view with captions.
ImageAdapter.OnItemClickListener
Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when an item in this AdapterView has been clicked.
ImageController
Controller responsible for managing image-related operations in Firebase Storage.
ImageControllerIntegrationTest
 
Location
This class represents a location with coordinates.
LocationTest
 
MainActivity
This class represents the main activity of the application.
NavBarTest
Tests to see if navigation controller can switch from event(main page for users) to other activities
OrphanedQRCodeFinder
Helper class for finding and processing orphaned QR codes.
ProfileActivity
Profile activity
ProfileTests
 
QRCodeGenerator
This class provides utility methods for QR code generation
QRCodeSpinnerAdapter
Custom ArrayAdapter for displaying QR codes and their corresponding IDs in a Spinner.
SetFailureListener
Listener interface for handling the failure of set operations.
SetSuccessListener
Listener interface for handling the success of set operations.
SnapshotListener<T>
Listener interface for handling snapshot data and errors from Firestore queries.
User
The User class is a representation of the Attendee entity.
UserController
Controller responsible for managing CRUD interactions between the View and the database.
UserControllerIntegrationTest
 
UserHome
This class will be the home page for attendee/organizer
UserLocationPair
Represents a pair consisting of a user ID and their check-in location.
UserTest
 
ViewAttendeesActivity
This activity displays the attendees of an event and provides functionality to notify attendees or check-in attendees based on the mode set.
ViewEventFragment
This class is the fragment for the individual event view
ViewEventTests
 
ViewMapActivity
This activity is responsible for displaying a map and handling various map-related functionalities, such as displaying check-in locations, selecting event locations, and displaying events.
